messages.title: General Election Update
messages.content: Despite the Prime Minister telling the British public time and time again that she wouldn't, we now face an early General Election. It's clear we cannot trust a word she says.

issues.brexitEurope: why I’m committed to ensuring we get the best possible deal for Gedling constituency from the Brexit negotiations.
issues.education: opposed Tory cuts to our local schools
issues.health: opposed Tory cuts to our local hospitals
issues.socialWelfare: opposed Tory cuts to our public services

leaflet.personalStatement: Serving you as your Member of Parliament for the last 20 years has been a privilege and honour.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Please remember to vote for your local Labour candidates in the local council election on Thursday 4 May.
